=======
gpvolve
=======


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/gpvolve.svg
        :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/gpvolve

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/lgoldbach/gpvolve.svg
        :target: https://travis-ci.org/lgoldbach/gpvolve

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/gpvolve/badge/?version=latest
        :target: https://gpvolve.readthedocs.io/en/latest/?badge=latest
        :alt: Documentation Status


.. image:: https://pyup.io/repos/github/lgoldbach/gpvolve/shield.svg
     :target: https://pyup.io/repos/github/lgoldbach/gpvolve/
     :alt: Updates



A python package for extracting tevolutionary trajectories from genotype-phenotype-maps


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://gpvolve.readthedocs.io.
